text: Answer: (b) Solution: Ex Time of 13 = CPI * CT = (1 + 0.35 * 0.2 * 1) * 0.5 ns = 0.535 ns Ex Time of 24 = CPI * CT = (1 + 0.35 * 0.25 * 2) * (1/3) ns = 0.3916666... ns Speed up = 0.535/0.3916666... = 1.365957... % faster = ((0.535 â€” 0.3916666)/0.3916666)*100 = 36.595 = 36.60% So, The second machine is 36.60% faster than the first machine.
